CustomField.description: Rank order of this stage in the workflow.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Rank refers to the position or order of a stage within the workflow. It determines the sequence in which the stages are presented or processed. A lower rank number indicates an earlier stage in the workflow, while a higher rank number indicates a later stage. The Rank helps establish the flow and progression of the workflow stages.
CustomField.label: Stage Rank
